channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Okay, im workin on a script, and i was wondering...
Is there a way i can add a procedure into another procedure...?
Any help is appreciated.
Thanx, M0ng00se

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

well i dont know if i understand correctly but

procedure time;
begin
gettime;
writeln(inttostr(time))
end;

you would have to write the new procedure and then it would do you procedure to get the time, and the it would right the time

or

procedure ify;
begin
if getcolor(345,321)=375 then
begin
writeln('screen is active')
wait(10)
writeln('nothing else to do')
end;
end;

this one make an if this happens then do this begin to end;, you could also just put begin script end;
and it would do the begin to end;

Read full topic
